sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-theme-provider dark>
    <base-section
      id="contact-us"
      class="primary"
      space="0"
    >
      <v-row
        align="center"
        justify="center"
      >
        <v-container
          class="px-2 mx-6"
        >
          <v-row class="align-center justify-center mx-4">
            <v-col
            cols="auto"
            class="px-2 ma-4 heading"
            >
              Send us your email to participate in Closed Beta
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
          <v-row
          class="align-center justify-center px-4 mb-4"
          justify="center"
          >
            <v-col
            cols="12"
            sm="8"
            md="8"
            lg="6"
            xl="4"
            >
              <v-text-field
              class="px-2 mx-1 centered-input"
              outlined
              dense
              single-line
              v-bind="$attrs"
              v-on="$listeners"
              hide-details
              :label= '$vuetify.breakpoint.xsOnly ? "Your Email address" : "Your Email address for Google Play"'
              >
              </v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col
            cols="5"
            sm="2"
            md="2"
            lg="2"
            xl="2"
            >
                <v-btn
                  class="px-2 ma-4"
                  height="40"
                  outlined
                >
                  Subscribe
                </v-btn>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
        </v-container>
      </v-row>
    </base-section>
  </v-theme-provider>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    name: 'SectionNewsletterAlt',
  }
</script>
<style lang="sass">
.centered-input.v-text-field .v-label
{
  left: 50% !important;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  transform-origin: top 50%;
  &.v-label--active
  {
    transform: translateY(-18px) scale(.75) translateX(-50%);
  }
}
</style>
